description.raw:
**Includes pull request #661.  Review and merge that one first.**

All the tests in `test/regression` for which the physics engine would seem to have an effect have been moved to the value-parameterized test pattern, with both ode and bullet variants.  I didn't do this for tests that seem to be physics-independent, such as transport and GPU tests.

There remain a few tests that don't have bullet variants, because they don't pass (grepping for `TEST_F` is a good start for finding tests that aren't parameterized):

~~~
physics.cc:TEST_F(PhysicsTest, JointDampingTest)
physics.cc:TEST_F(PhysicsTest, DropStuff)
physics.cc:TEST_F(PhysicsTest, CollisionTest)
surface_properties.cc:TEST_F(PhysicsTest, CollideWithoutContact)
~~~
